content:
Hi, I am Shivam Gupta. I would like to contribute to open source projects, particularly compilers.
Nice to have you all!

Hi, I am a student from China majoring in Computer Science and Technology. I would like to make some contribution to Rust.

I am very interested in Clippy right now. I think my first contribution might be about Clippy.

My English is not very good, but I'm trying to improve it. By the way, if anyone wants to learn Chinese, I can help them.
